page.title: GNS - Dynamic News Generator
page.t: Galactic News Service - Dynamic News Generator
[author]Galactic News Service[/author] [b]Dynamic News Generator[/b] has been enabled
[author]Galactic News Service[/author] [b]Dynamic News Generator[/b] has been disabled

This is a dynamic news article. It is published in %s sectors. It is set to be displayed %s. %s\n\nDynamic News articles (not titles!) can use placeholder variables to automatically swap in the requested text. Using placeholder variables, the news service reports that your name is $PLAYERNAME$ and you are currently flying a $PLAYERSHIPCLASS$ $PLAYERSHIPTYPE$.
